statements: SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, interests FROM students WHERE student_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE interests = 'Math' ORDER BY email ASC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE learning_style = 'Visual' ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_name, interests FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY interests ASC, student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, email, interests FROM students WHERE learning_style IN ('Visual', 'Auditory') ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE interests LIKE '%Science%' OR learning_style = 'Kinesthetic' ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, interest_area FROM students WHERE interest_area = 'Science';
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM learning_groups WHERE group_topic = 'Data Science' ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id > 100 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM learning_groups WHERE group_description LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE interest_area = 'Science';
SELECT student_name, interest_area FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_topic FROM learning_groups WHERE group_description LIKE '%advanced%';
SELECT * FROM students s INNER JOIN learning_groups g ON s.interest_area = g.group_topic
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, interest FROM students WHERE interest='Music';
SELECT student_name, interest FROM students WHERE interest='Sports' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM groups WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM groups ORDER BY group_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, interest FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, group_name FROM students INNER JOIN student_groups ON students.student_id = student_groups.student_id INNER JOIN groups ON student_groups.group_id = groups.group_id;

SELECT student_id, student_name, interest, group_name FROM students INNER JOIN student_groups ON students.student_id = student_groups.student_id INNER JOIN groups ON student_groups.group_id = groups.group_id WHERE interest = 'Science';

SELECT student_id, student_name, interest, group_name FROM students INNER JOIN student_groups ON students.student_id = student_groups.student_id INNER JOIN groups ON student_groups.group_id = groups.group_id ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, interests FROM Students WHERE learning_style='Visual';
SELECT student_name, learning_style FROM Students WHERE interests='Programming';
SELECT student_name, learning_style, interests FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE interests = 'Sports';
SELECT student_name, interests FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, interests, style_name FROM Students JOIN LearningStyles ON Students.learning_style = LearningStyles.style_id;
SELECT student1_id, student2_id, connection_type FROM StudentConnections WHERE connection_type = 'Friend';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT full_name, email FROM students WHERE interest_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, full_name, email, interest_name FROM students JOIN interests ON students.interest_id = interests.interest_id;
SELECT full_name, learning_style FROM students JOIN learning_styles ON students.interest_id = learning_styles.style_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE learning_style = 'Visual';

SELECT * FROM students JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id JOIN interests ON student_interests.interest_id = interests.interest_id WHERE interests.interest_name = 'Coding'

SELECT students.full_name, interests.interest_name FROM students INNER JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id INNER JOIN interests ON student_interests.interest_id = interests.interest_id WHERE students.learning_style = 'Visual'

SELECT students.full_name, learning_styles.style_name FROM students INNER JOIN student_styles ON students.student_id = student_styles.student_id INNER JOIN learning_styles ON student_styles.style_id = learning_styles.style_id WHERE students.full_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT students.full_name, student_interests.interest_id FROM students LEFT JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id WHERE student_interests.interest_id IS NULL

SELECT students.full_name, interests.interest_name, learning_styles.style_name FROM students JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id JOIN interests ON student_interests.interest_id = interests.interest_id JOIN student_styles ON students.student_id = student_styles.student_id JOIN learning_styles ON student_styles.style_id = learning_styles.style_id
